previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. DC United | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 0, DC United 3 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Sporting Kansas City take on D.C. United at Sporting Park in a crucial matchup for top spot in the Eastern Conference
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs. D.C. United

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Huge test for #DCU. Big losses to #RSL, Seattle seem to imply that they're still a cut below the MLS elite... Chance to shake that tonight.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: What an ankle-breaker by Benny. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Benny is everywhere tonight. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Bryce Moose Precure
timelineItems.text: #SKC looking very attacking to start this match. Benny also looking good

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Soony Saad with an ambitious effort off a free kick

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Graham Zusi.
Attempt missed. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Mark Betka
timelineItems.text: In Bill I Trust #DCU

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Safe to say that Saad is feeling it from distance after last week.

timelineItems.name: Kirk Harris
timelineItems.text: Whew that was a screaming shot #SPORTINGKC

timelineItems.name: Ed Rowe
timelineItems.text: When #SKC plays with this intensity and connects passes. Wow. #MLS is all grown up.

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: @KCNFFC #dcu are normally very slow starters. but this is not the team to give an early goal to.

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Tonight, #DCU works for our ever-faithful Black-and-Red Supporters who made the trip to KC. #BestFansInMLS #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luis Silva (D.C. United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Nick DeLeon.
Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dodds
timelineItems.text: Kemp needs to mind his positioning or he'll keep Dwyer onside all night. #DCU

timelineItems.name: La Norte
timelineItems.text: Hey, @ussoccer, with Tim Howard on hiatus we have a @BillHamid28 you can borrow. #DCU #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Alex Boyer
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC looks faster, stronger, and better than #DCU in every way. Dominating the first 20 minutes.

timelineItems.comment: Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: James Barry
timelineItems.text: #SKC may score more than the chiefs.

timelineItems.name: Connor
timelineItems.text: Some #DCU fans actually made the trip to KC. Well done

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

timelineItems.name: Brennen
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dodds
timelineItems.text: This has been the most DeLeon has been involved in quite a while. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 0, D.C. United 3.

timelineItems.desc: Sporting Kansas City take on D.C. United at Sporting Park in a crucial matchup for top spot in the Eastern Conference.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting Kansas City vs. D.C. United | August 23, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Sal Zizzo.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: And now we're into a pattern of #DCU attacking and #SportingKC clearing. Need to get the midfield going again if we want to win possession.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Dominic Dwyer.
Attempt missed. Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Fabian Espindola with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Carter Williams
timelineItems.text: Futból is fun #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 0, D.C. United 1. Fabian Espindola (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Fabian Espindola neatly tucks it into the corner

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: Two goals in two games for Fabi vs. #SKC. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Steven Wright
timelineItems.text: AS SOON AS I TURN THE MATCH ON! #DCU

timelineItems.name: maria
timelineItems.text: Welcome back Espindola! #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Silva (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: E-SPIN-dola. That shot. #SKCvDC http://t.co/eW2la9HEbV

timelineItems.name: Ted Meyer
timelineItems.text: So yeah, let's just get this started already #Fabi4MVP #DCU

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 0, D.C. United 2. Chris Rolfe (D.C. United) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Chris Rolfe times run beautifully and finishes

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Fabi takes Collin to school on that one. #dcu have to ratchet down on the defense now. No need to give quick goal.

timelineItems.name: Alex Boyer
timelineItems.text: Disaster. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, D.C. United. Bobby Boswell tries a through ball, but Fabian Espindola is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: #DCU fans if you have MLS Live they game IS available to watch in the D.C. Area #DCvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Davy Arnaud.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schneider
timelineItems.text: Welp. Terrible defending - again. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Mark the Overseer
timelineItems.text: Kempin almost made that one on one save there... Tough to come back from down 2-0. But #IBelieveThatWeWillWin #WeDefendTogether

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 0, D.C. United 3. Perry Kitchen (D.C. United) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Perry Kitchen is sprung free and buries it

timelineItems.name: Reporting KC
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC looks out of gas from playing its 3rd game in 7 days.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Chris Rolfe flies away and puts @DCUnited up 2-0 over @SportingKC. #SKCvDC

timelineItems.name: Andy Lohman
timelineItems.text: Players like Chris Rolfe who have just a natural sense of the game are my favorite to coach. Also, this game is fun #DCU

timelineItems.name: Christopher Dodds
timelineItems.text: Collin has been a real liability for KC tonight...let's hope #DCU keeps going after him.

timelineItems.comment: Perry Kitchen (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: Ooof. Gonna be a weird second half. #SportingKC defense in shambles, offense lifeless. This game could end 3-3 or 5-0 to DC. Reaction is key

timelineItems.name: D.C. United Matchday
timelineItems.text: What an aggressive run by Kitchen, who beat Collin with a cutback and finished crisply near post. #DCU #SKCvDC

timelineItems.name: Jennifer P
timelineItems.text: What the ... #SportingKC #SKCvDC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Chris Hurst
timelineItems.text: Wow, miserable showing by #SportingKC. Race for the Supporters Shield got ugly.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Perry Kitchen. @DCUnited running away with this one in the first half. 3-0 #DCU #SKCvDC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Statement game. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Alex Ozenberger
timelineItems.text: With moves like that, we'll see @PerryKitchen23 starting at forward before too long. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Kazie
timelineItems.text: On the bright side...#DCU scored 3 goals in the span of 10 minutes. Against SKC. IN Blue Hell. I approve.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: Wow, #DCU is just taking it to Sporting KC. With Silva and Espindola on a roll, you have to think EJ sits.

timelineItems.name: abby_joy777
timelineItems.text: Loving my first time out to a sporting game #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Ted Meyer
timelineItems.text: Who is having a worse night right now, the #SKC backline or Eddie Johnson? #DCU

timelineItems.name: Jim Bush
timelineItems.text: I'm blaming this mess on Benny's shorts. #tootight #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schneider
timelineItems.text: Embarrassing home form will be the death of this #SportingKC side.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Sapong for Zizzo, who comes off gingerly.

timelineItems.name: T.J. Scholl
timelineItems.text: I'm not at the game, but my dance moves at this wedding just escalated after checking the #dcu score. Holy crap. Keep it up boys.

timelineItems.comment: Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Silva (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: Wait... Is Benny wearing short shorts? #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Melody Grace
timelineItems.text: SKC v. DC United. Welcome to the blue hell. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: InWoodbridge
timelineItems.text: This is just incredible on the road at #SKC! What a great response to the opportunity to lead the table.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bobby Boswell (D.C. United).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ronald Moreno
timelineItems.text: #SKC need that 15 minute break so bad. Let's see what team looks like in the second half after #Vermes' "talk". #SKCvDC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Bill Hamid (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: whiteknuckled
timelineItems.text: Chris Rolfe clearly carrying the Chris Korb tiny shinguards/low socks torch tonight. #DCU.

timelineItems.name: DMV Sportswire
timelineItems.text: Chris Rolfe has a goal & an assist, Luis Silva 2 assists & Fabian Espindola has scored his 9th of the season. #DCU continues turnaround year

timelineItems.text: This "Hold up your hand and pray for offside" crap has got to stop. Disgraceful. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: So I think we've already established that long through passes on the ground won't work against DC. Do something else, #SportingKC #SKCvDC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Bill Hamid.

timelineItems.name: Benji Settlemyre
timelineItems.text: So close Estrada #DCU

timelineItems.name: valeri lea
timelineItems.text: The post is gonna make player of the week. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: That ball from Espindola..... that ball..... i could marry that ball. #DCU

timelineItems.name: Isaac Knopf
timelineItems.text: First time I've clearly seen the 'SPORTING' spelled out on the seats during a game. Not a good sign. Not a good night for #SportingKC.

timelineItems.name: Brian Flanagan
timelineItems.text: Huh, I didn't realize DeLeon was in... #dcu #SKCvDC

timelineItems.comment: Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Christopher Shawn
timelineItems.text: #DCU beats Sporting and moves into first place. I love everything about this! #Vamos

timelineItems.name: Clinton R. Smith
timelineItems.text: Top of the table! #DCU

timelineItems.name: Shari Beeson
timelineItems.text: Still love my boys in blue #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. David Estrada (D.C. United) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Perry Kitchen.
Foul by Alex Caskey (D.C. United).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 0, D.C. United 3.
